item.description:
Perfect for the new climber. We will set up routes on easy climbs and give new climbers a bit of time on the rope. I will also try to teach you how to tie the figure 8. It's a bit like learning how to tie y'r shoes.
Bring any climbing equipment that you might have.
We will then go swim at Houghton Pond. Please call me if you have any questions. 617 501-6217

The details: Quincy Quarries has no facilities so bring water.

11AM, meet at Porter Sq. Red line for car pooling to Quincy Quarries. Meet at the big red wind mill sculpture.

12 Noon, Meet at Quincy Quarries parking lot.

2PM Drive to Houghton Pond and jump in the water.

We will have drinks in Sommerville later in the evening.

Cheers, Geoff
item.name: Quincy Quarries for Newbies
